channel.title: Rate This Banner!
channel.description:
Alright this is my first banner I have made for my Current Project and my 4th Graphic (My other servers backround, my avatar and my Sig) So here it is.
Note: The Backround in Transparent and It was made in Corel not Photo Shop :p, I also took all the pictures In-Game
Im still deciding if im going to keep the blue glow. Tell me if you like it or not :)
[img]http://img155.imageshack.us/img155/7318/cammy.png[/img]
Edit- I removed the glow tell me what one is better :)
[img]http://img697.imageshack.us/img697/6071/cammynoglow.png[/img]

item.description:
@_icestorm wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:30, topic:349447”][quote author=Opium10 link=topic=445815.msg3272306#msg3272306 date=1279301237]
6, This is pretty fantastic, for your first banner…
[/quote]It is not fantastic.

Download a legitimate paint software such as Gimp or Photoshop.[/quote] The only reason im using corel because thats what I have to use for school…[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:27, topic:349447”]Duplicated font i think and horribly cropped rsps characters slapped on a transparent background.[/quote] No I didn’t duplicate it

item.title: Rate This Banner!
item.dc:creator: @_icestorm ~*icestorm*~
item.description:
@_icestorm wrote:

Yeh Im going to start a new one where every picture is of a guy attacking another guy but it looks like each one is attacking another picture. If you under stand what I mean. Does any one know a good screen shot taker? I got a laptop and it has no print screen button, Iv been doing all of these in hypercam and wany non-blurry pics

Edit- Rofl this is what I mean, Yes I made it in paint in 30 seconds

Each guy is suppost to be attacking eachother

Read full topic

item.title: Rate This Banner!
item.dc:creator: @Defiance Defiance
item.description:
@Defiance wrote:

[quote="~icestorm~, post:7, topic:349447"][quote author=ziplock link=topic=445815.msg3272325#msg3272325 date=1279302391]
Glow is being cut off. You should probably smooth the cutouts, it’s kind of pixleated, you should probably add some type of background. I like how you had the characters facing the logo but maybe if it wad a little more busy with colors or lines. I don’t get the two cutouts on the side which have the actual background when the others don’t. I think you should cut them out completely smooth it up and add some more traffic.
[/quote]Thats not the backround its part of the skillcape Gfx

[quote author=Defiance link=topic=445815.msg3272327#msg3272327 date=1279302500]
I’d say keep the no-glow and remove the skillcape emotes or smooth the edges of them.
[/quote] Yeh ill smoth the edges once I learn how, If I removed the emotes tho it would just be plain text :p[/quote]

Lol yea, i just realized all of them are emote, i meant the prayer and magic ones

Read full topic

item.title: Rate This Banner!
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote="~icestorm~, post:9, topic:349447"][quote author=ziplock link=topic=445815.msg3272338#msg3272338 date=1279302815]

[quote author=~icestorm~ link=topic=445815.msg3272330#msg3272330 date=1279302616]

[quote author=ziplock link=topic=445815.msg3272325#msg3272325 date=1279302391]
Glow is being cut off. You should probably smooth the cutouts, it’s kind of pixleated, you should probably add some type of background. I like how you had the characters facing the logo but maybe if it wad a little more busy with colors or lines. I don’t get the two cutouts on the side which have the actual background when the others don’t. I think you should cut them out completely smooth it up and add some more traffic.
[/quote]Thats not the backround its part of the skillcape Gfx

I’d say keep the no-glow and remove the skillcape emotes or smooth the edges of them.
[/quote] Yeh ill smoth the edges once I learn how, If I removed the emotes tho it would just be plain text

Oh I see. I still think it might look better with it completely cut out. Just opinion, but a clever background would really add some appeal.
[/quote]See the reason why theres no backround is because this is going to be my forum banner, which is just going to use the forum theme as the backround :)[/quote]

Ooh, I see what you did there.

Read full topic
